title: Psychological Resilience Enhancement Program for Increased Engagement in Online English Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: A non-degree course aimed at enhancing workplace competencies within enterprises. Supporting blended learning environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can improve learning persistence by 20% by applying at least three psychological resilience strategies (e.g., self-regulation, perseverance) during online English learning.
Learners can recognize negative emotions (e.g., anxiety, boredom) during learning and implement at least two strategies to shift them into positive emotions (e.g., joy).
Learners can visualize and interpret their learning engagement patterns using structural equation modeling and psychological network analysis tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
